channel.title: Project - GameFox
channel.description:
Hey guys, I started a big project a couple of days ago with using a funscap3 source! I think some of you guys remember this source in the old days which has been used alot, i also want it to look like the old days!
Please dont blame or troll me on my work because this will be my first project i do.
This is are my first goals to achieve: [code] - Creating a good basic economy (80 percent) - Fixing the attacking NPC BUG (Not started) - Cleaning up all annoying commands (Done) - New features, Like what DELTA started (50 Percent) with the character variables. - All object in the areas that i am going to use will be working! (5 Percent) - Alot more character dialogues. (Not started)[/code] When im done with this list i will adding some more features!
Thanks to Justin who relleased this source ages ago! I will update the update log weekly because i dont have alot of time but there will be alot of updates!
UPDATE LOG: [code] 6/10/11 - 2 Founded glitches (Speaking in wilderniss & Attack target tab) - Cleaned up 200 Kb in client.class - Restoring the Spellbook [Started] - Using the Spellbook tab instead of the Emote tab [Started] - Adding the variables [Starter, Holidays] 5/10/11 - Updated the item.cfg for better prices - Cleaning up some command [Finished] - Cleaning up the world [Npcs, Shops][/code]
PICTURES:
New starting area (tutorial island) And the new starting stuff! [img]http://img262.imageshack.us/img262/8080/naamloosmo.png[/img]

item.title: Project - GameFox
item.dc:creator: @C4ll3r C4ll3r
item.description:
@C4ll3r wrote:

Hey guys, I started a big project a couple of days ago with using a funscap3 source!
I think some of you guys remember this source in the old days which has been used alot,
i also want it to look like the old days!

Please dont blame or troll me on my work because this will be my first project i do.

This is are my first goals to achieve:

[code]

  • Creating a good basic economy (80 percent)
  • Fixing the attacking NPC BUG (Not started)
  • Cleaning up all annoying commands (Done)
  • New features, Like what DELTA started (50 Percent)
    with the character variables.
  • All object in the areas that i am going to use will be working! (5 Percent)
  • Alot more character dialogues. (Not started)[/code]
    When im done with this list i will adding some more features!

Thanks to Justin who relleased this source ages ago!
I will update the update log weekly because i dont have alot of time but there will be alot of updates!

UPDATE LOG:

[code]
6/10/11

  • 2 Founded glitches (Speaking in wilderniss &
    Attack target tab)
  • Cleaned up 200 Kb in client.class
  • Restoring the Spellbook [Started]
    • Using the Spellbook tab instead of the Emote tab [Started]
  • Adding the variables [Starter, Holidays]
    5/10/11
  • Updated the item.cfg for better prices
  • Cleaning up some command [Finished]
  • Cleaning up the world [Npcs, Shops][/code]

PICTURES:

New starting area (tutorial island) And the new starting stuff!
